text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump is a reckless leader, his actions early on with regard to Covid-19 have cost American lives. His reassurances that all was OK was a lie, he knew what was coming but chose complacency & it cost thousands of U.S lives. Trump is the cause of the cost we now pay. https://t.co/ZgCt8pYEip
